Articles.Content: Hello. I have a bug where time warp is locked. This happens in the atmosphere or out of the atmosphere. I think its really anooying please help. (possible mods that causes this: Better Time warp continued or Time control. )

12 hours ago, paul_c said:

Is it locked at 1x speed?

that is exact bug yes. I know my ship had electric charge as well. It also happens on unmanned or manned craft.

I've seen it before too, on 1x speed. Going to the Tracking Station, selecting it then flying it restores time warp function, at least until it happens again. I've never gotten to the bottom of it though.
alright, think we should post this on ksp bug tracker?

I also can confirm that timwarp occasionally becomes incontrollable while in space in 1.11.1. Switching back to KSC and back to the spacecraft makes it controllable again.

Never have i seen this bug in earlier versions of the game.

Also I noted that Kerbal Alarm 3.13.0 clock has become buggy with this version of the game. Sometimes it doesnt let me add alarms or overwrites existing alarms with new ones. Maybe there is a link since both functions deal with time?
